title: Philippines - Tourist/Visit Visa

details.title: Eligibility
items: Atleast travel to one ASIAN country.

details.title: Required Documents
items: Proof of Financial capability e.g. bank solvency.
Bank Statement of visa applicant, Minimum Balance Tk 2 Lac.
For Businessmen: Trade License (English translate with notarized).
For Employees: NOC letter, Student: Letter fromschool/University. ID.
Two copies of 2x2 recent photographs (white background).
Passport valid for not lessthan Nine (9) months.
Atleast travel to one ASIAN country. e.g. Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand etc..

note: All expenditures related to visa processing are strictly non-refundable. Visa information and associated charges are subject to change at any time without prior notice. We provide assistance only and do not guarantee the issuance of visas. This information sheet has been prepared by us and may include additional details beyond the embassy's requirements.
